Here is a list of basic curves drawn with ggplot2.

the graphic:


::: {.cell}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| warning: false
#| error: false
library(tidyverse)
```
````
:::


### Normal Distribution

We can draw the normal curve changing the stat_function of the graphic:


::: {.cell}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| warning: false
#| error: false

normal_curve_plot <- 
  ggplot(tibble(x = c(-5, 5)), 
         aes(x = x)) +
  stat_function(fun = dnorm, color = "darkred") +
  theme_minimal()
normal_curve_plot
```
````

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Student Distribution

For the student distribution we need to define the function and the degree of freedom (df):


::: {.cell}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| warning: false
#| error: false

t_curve_plot <- 
  ggplot(tibble(x = c(-5, 5)), 
         aes(x = x)) +
  stat_function(fun = dt, args = list(df = 3), color = "steelblue") +
  theme_minimal()
t_curve_plot
```
````

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### F Distribution

For the F distribution we need to define the function and the 2 degree of freedom parameters (df1 and df2):


::: {.cell}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| warning: false
#| error: false

f_curve_plot <- 
  ggplot(tibble(x = c(-5, 5)), 
         aes(x = x)) +
  stat_function(fun = df, args = list(df1 = 2, df2 = 50), color = "gray") +
  theme_minimal()
f_curve_plot
```
````

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Chi-Squared Distribution

For the chi-squared distribution we need to define the function, the degree of freedom (df), and the non-centrality parameter (ncp):


::: {.cell}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| warning: false
#| error: false

chi_curve_plot <- 
  ggplot(tibble(x = c(-5, 5)), 
         aes(x = x)) +
  stat_function(fun = dchisq, args = list(df = 3, ncp = 0), color = "darkorange") +
  theme_minimal()
chi_curve_plot
```
````

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### All together

All together now.


::: {.cell}

````{.cell-code}
```{{r}}
#| warning: false
#| error: false

all_curve_plot <- 
  ggplot(tibble(x = c(-5, 5)), 
         aes(x = x)) +
  stat_function(fun = dchisq, args = list(df = 3, ncp = 0), color = "darkorange") +
  stat_function(fun = df, args = list(df1 = 2, df2 = 50), color = "gray") +
    stat_function(fun = dt, args = list(df = 3), color = "steelblue") +
  stat_function(fun = dnorm, color = "darkred") +
  theme_minimal()
all_curve_plot
```
````

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
